lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Ike Kerridge, an economist with the oilfield service firm Baker Hughes Inc., was one of several analysts who said the evaporation of billions of dollars of paper profits could alter consumer behavior.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Several years ago Miller's firm was one of the first to pursue program trading strategies, seeking to lock in an automatic profit by taking advantage of discrepancies in the prices of the futures and the underlying stocks.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Wall Street's biggest one-day drop since 1914 has revived a bitter debate about whether modern investment techniques turn shifts in investor psychology into colossal moves in share prices.
